ValidationRule.description: NICC-058179; The Owner of an Internal Project must be an active user to mark the Project Completed. The Owner will be used as the “Assigned To” on automatically-generated Project Backlog Tasks.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name = "Commercial_Operation_Projects", Owner:User.IsActive = FALSE, $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", AND(ISCHANGED(Request_Status__c ), ISPICKVAL(Request_Status__c, "Completed") ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Warning: The record Owner is inactive and needs to be reassigned. If assistance is needed, please reach out to the Process Improvement Team.
